result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lukas John Brenneman

defendant.name: Brenneman, Lukas John
defendant.address: c/o Manitowoc County Jail, 1025 South 9th Street, Manitowoc, WI 54220

records.addlTxt: Letter from defendant requesting new counsel.

Defendant in custody appearing via zoom from Dodge Correctional Institution.   
Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.   Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 1 for further proceedings.    
ARRAIGNMENT 
Information to be filed.   Not guilty pleas.   Jury Calendar.   Offer deadline with DA is set for 08-26-22 at 8:30 a.m.   Scheduling conference is set for 09-21-22 at 10:30 a.m.   
Minutes.
Instructions for How to Appear Remotely.

1:45 p.m. - Prosecuting attorney Angelina R Scarpelli in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Lukas John Brenneman not in court.  Attorney Daniel G. Mitchell appeared by video for Lukas John Brenneman.  Defendant was to be appearing by zoom from Dodge Correctional.  Dodge was contacted, they had the defendant on the calendar for today, but can no longer accommodate his zoom appearance.  Initial appearance is reset to 07-18-22 at 1:30 p.m. Br. 1.
Instructions for How to Appear Remotely.
Initial appearance on June 27, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant was moved to Dodge Correctional.   Initial appearance is reset to 06-27-22 at 1:30 p.m.    
Minutes.

ADDRESS INFO for Lukas John Brenneman
Current: c/o Manitowoc County Jail, 1025 South 9th Street, Manitowoc, WI 54220   (Effective: 05-06-2022)
Prior: 934 S. 12th Street, Manitowoc, WI 54220
Notice of Hearing returned as undeliverable. Forwarding address provided. Remailed on 5-6-2022.
Initial appearance on May 16, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

2:13 pm - Prosecuting attorney Gail Ann Prost in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Lukas John Brenneman appeared by video, in custody at Manitowoc County Jail. Attorney Luke Harrison in court for defendant.  More time needed to appoint counsel in this matter.
Initial appearance scheduled for May 16, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

3:28 pm - Prosecuting attorney Angelina R Scarpelli appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Lukas John Brenneman appeared by video, in custody. Attorney Luke Harrison appearing in person, for the defendant.  More time needed to appoint counsel in this matter.  Initial appearance is reset to 04-18-22 at 1:30 p.m. Br. 1.  The defendant advises the court that he will now sign his recognizance bond.
Adjourned initial appearance on April 18, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.

Defendant appears, in custody, on warrant.  Initial appearance is set for 03-21-2022 at 1:30pm.  Bail is set at $2,000.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that he maintain absolute sobriety from alcohol and drugs.
Bail not furnished and defendant is remanded to the county jail.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.  Copy filed.  
Warrant with service of officer thereon.
Minutes.
Re:  Deliver Methamphetamine, 2nd and subsequent offense, within 1,000 feet of park, on 09-28-21.
